Starting with the initial arrangement: Alice has a purple ball, Bob has a green ball, Claire has a pink ball, Dave has a red ball, Eve has a blue ball, Fred has a white ball, and Gertrude has a black ball. Following the trades: 1. Eve and Dave swap: Eve -> red, Dave -> blue. 2. Eve and Fred swap: Eve -> white, Fred -> red. 3. Eve and Dave swap: Eve -> blue, Dave -> white. 4. Eve and Alice swap: Eve -> purple, Alice -> blue. 5. Bob and Alice swap: Bob -> blue, Alice -> green. 6. Gertrude and Claire swap: Gertrude -> pink, Claire -> black. 7.
